comments:
1. Open a file located in CVS using Source editor
2. close the file

Get the below exception.

Looks like the structuredmodel is being released one too many times.

The StructuredTextEditor.dispose() method was assuming the current model had to
be released, even though this is only the case when not using an IModelProvider.
 For non-IModelProviders, a getModelForEdit() occurs in doSetInput() and
dispose() was repsonsible for the releaseFromEdit() call.  The releaseFromEdit()
call can be moved into disposeDocumentProvider() and, there, check the document
provider to ensure correct disconnection is performed whether or not an
IModelProvider is in use.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
